documentation.text:
@title PharmaChain
 @dev A smart contract to track a drug's journey through the supply chain.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of this drug."

arguments.value: You are not the owner of this drug.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner of this drug."

documentation.text:
@dev Function for the manufacturer to create a new drug entry.
 @param _name The name of the drug (e.g., "Aspirin 500mg").

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(uint256,string storage ref,address,address,string storage ref,string storage ref)

devdoc.details: A smart contract to track a drug's journey through the supply chain.

addDrug(string).details: Function for the manufacturer to create a new drug entry.

getDrugDetails(uint256).details: Public function to get all details of a drug. 'view' means it's read-only and doesn't cost any gas to call.

params._drugID: The ID of the drug to check.

returns._0: All 6 fields of the Drug struct.

updateDrugStage(uint256,address,string).details: Function to update the drug stage and transfer ownership. This function uses the 'only_owner' modifier to ensure security.

params._drugID: The ID of the drug to update.
params._newOwner: The address of the new owner (e.g., distributor or pharmacist).
params._newStage: A string describing the new stage (e.g., "ShippedToDistributor").

devdoc.title: PharmaChain
